article: Abbaye,a master artist, was ready to retire in 1392. One day, Bartoli, a rich Italian merchant, sent for him saying, "Could you42 _ my portrait on my banquet room wall? It's 20 feet tall." Furthermore, already I can see your private .So I insist that while l work your portrait stay48 _ -even from you!" Immediately the master artist _ a high curtain in front of the wall, -through which Bartoli couldn't see at all. A week passed. "How is it coming?" asked the _ Bartoli.  ''It's coming quite well. Abbaye had drawn to his heart's _ for 20 feet tall. Perhaps Bartoli couldn't tolerate his abstract expression, which Picasso would have been proud of.
